_comment: Configuration with rules enabled by default. Severity levels are defined by rule developers - users don't configure severity.

kwargs._comment: Optional: Specify a custom pylintrc file path. If not specified, uses .config/ignition.pylintrc
kwargs._debug_comment: Optional: Set debug: true to save script files even when there are no errors. Debug files are ALWAYS saved automatically when pylint finds errors.
kwargs._debug_dir_comment: Optional: Specify custom debug directory. Defaults to .ignition-lint/debug/ (or tests/debug/ in ignition-lint repo). Can be absolute or relative path.
kwargs._batch_mode_comment: Optional: Set batch_mode: true to process all files together (faster but harder to read). Default: false (process each file separately for clearer output).

kwargs._comment: Use 'convention' for predefined patterns, or 'custom_pattern' with optional 'suggestion_convention' for custom regex patterns

_example._note: When using custom_pattern, add suggestion_convention to provide helpful naming suggestions in error messages

kwargs._comment: Detects excessive context data in custom properties using 4 methods: (1) max_array_size: arrays with too many items, (2) max_sibling_properties: too many properties at the same level, (3) max_nesting_depth: overly deep nesting, (4) max_data_points: total volume of data stored in custom properties.

Detects brittle component references like .getSibling(), .getParent(), .getChild(), .parent, .children that create tight coupling to view structure. Use view.custom properties or message handling instead.

_info._description: Rule severity levels are defined by rule developers:

rule_severities.NamePatternRule: warning - naming conventions are style preferences
rule_severities.PollingIntervalRule: error - performance issues that can cause system problems
rule_severities.PylintScriptRule: error - syntax errors, undefined variables, etc.
rule_severities.UnusedCustomPropertiesRule: error - dead code that should be removed
rule_severities.ExcessiveContextDataRule: error - architectural issue, data should be in databases
rule_severities.BadComponentReferenceRule: error - brittle view structure dependencies that break during refactoring

_info.note: Users cannot configure severity levels - they are determined by what each rule checks.

PylintScriptRule_config.pylintrc: Path to custom pylintrc file. Defaults to .config/ignition.pylintrc if not specified.
